subject: “Vivad se Vishwas – II (Contractual Disputes) Scheme” issued by Dept. of Expenditure; MoF vide OM dated 29.05.2023- reg.
text: HRdy 754 rTHRif qiferas<ot (Tg45 8r <nTARf HATT4, IRa TGFR) National Highways Authority of India Frytq T4a (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 4l-5 Qd 6, #zr-10, ERWT, 78 faorlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 3M /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Dispute Resolution /2023 Policy Circular No.2.1.63/ 2023 dated 03th October , 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Vivad/se/ Vishwas-Il/2023-Part(1)(Comp. No. 210300)} Sub: (Vivad se Vishwas II (Contractual Disputes) Scheme' issued by Dept: of Expenditure, MoF vide OM dated 29.05.2023- reg: MoRTH vide letter No.NH-24028/09/2022-H (E-194788) dated 06.06.2023 forwarded copy of the OM issued by Ministry of Finance, Dept. of Expenditure (DoF) vide their OM No. F.1/7/2022-PPD dated 29.05.2023 (Annexure-1) to implement one time settlement scheme called Vivad se Vishwas I (Contractual Disputes) = to effectively settle pending disputes: Subsequently, NHAI vide Policy Circular No_ 2.1.60/2023 dated 04.07.2023 issued Standard Operating Procedure to be followed to implement the subject scheme. 2 Now, MoF, DoE vide OM No. F.1/7/2022-PPD dated 18.09.2023 (Annexure-2) has issued certain corrections and clarifications for implementation of the subject scheme: A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 3 RLskeck (Sunil Prakash Bhardwaj) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation: 4Raet 'M { 7 91 NHAL New Copy
